import{format,getTime,formatDistanceToNow}from'date-fns';// ----------------------------------------------------------------------
export function fDate(date,newFormat){var fm=newFormat||'dd MMM yyyy';return date?format(new Date(date),fm):'';}export function fDateTime(date,newFormat){var fm=newFormat||'dd MMM yyyy p';return date?format(new Date(date),fm):'';}export function fTimestamp(date){return date?getTime(new Date(date)):'';}export function fToNow(date){return date?formatDistanceToNow(new Date(date),{addSuffix:true}):'';}
